channel.title: Smuggling
channel.description: How do you smuggle the icons from BA?

item.title: Smuggling
item.dc:creator: @Anieli Anieli
item.description:
@Anieli wrote:

There was a method a couple of weeks back that allowed people to have them equipped outside. And no I do not mean the quest primal Armour I mean legit dung items. (No idea how they managed it before anyone asks)

Read full topic

item.title: Smuggling
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Anieli, post:22, topic:424313”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=526966.msg3847476#msg3847476 date=1323735190]

Does anyone know how to do them is my next question. I’m desperate for a tangle gum staff

I’m pretty sure now if you:

[ul][li]Equip it
Bank it
Drop it
Trade it
Stake it[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

It dissappears or something.

If you don’t interrupt it.
[/quote]No it definitely disappears now.

Based on item id but if you interrupt and use it… win.

You cannot “Interupt” Dungeoneering items while equipping them. If they have been coded to disappear they will. However I am not saying it is impossible to have such items equipped outside just very difficult.[/quote]Theres no way around it. If it disappears on any action, even summoning smuggles, then it will.

Read full topic

item.title: Smuggling
item.dc:creator: @Anieli Anieli
item.description:
@Anieli wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:21, topic:424313”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=526966.msg3843773#msg3843773 date=1323465708]

Does anyone know how to do them is my next question. I’m desperate for a tangle gum staff

I’m pretty sure now if you:

[ul][li]Equip it
Bank it
Drop it
Trade it
Stake it[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

It dissappears or something.

If you don’t interrupt it.
[/quote]No it definitely disappears now.

Based on item id but if you interrupt and use it… win.[/quote]

You cannot “Interupt” Dungeoneering items while equipping them. If they have been coded to disappear they will. However I am not saying it is impossible to have such items equipped outside just very difficult.

Read full topic

item.title: Smuggling
item.dc:creator: @Anieli Anieli
item.description:
@Anieli wrote:

Equip it - Not sure, might try later coz mines a bound one
Bank it - Not Bankable
Drop it - Disintegrates
Trade it - Disintegrates
Stake it - Not Stakeable

Read full topic

item.title: Smuggling
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

i know a useless one.
To summon something in building mode, you gotta teleport to your house,
use the teleport out of your house,
then teleport to your house (building mode) then as soon as you click that,
spam click the report button, wait untill you hear some weird noise,
spawn your familiar and close the report interface.

Read full topic

item.title: Smuggling
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:6, topic:424313”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=526966.msg3840257#msg3840257 date=1323180770]

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=526966.msg3840124#msg3840124 date=1323155526]

[quote author=l0gik link=topic=526966.msg3840098#msg3840098 date=1323150699]
you can’t
[/quote]Actually you can, i’m not entirely sure how though.
[/quote]Stalls, CFTs
[/quote]Well yeah, that i know. I don’t know exactly how that specific glitch is performed though![/quote]All different types, for example (now patched).

Elvarg the green dragon, lets say you poisoned him, he is dying, and just leave him with 1000 hp, when you teleport it says he still in combat due to him being poisoned. Now go to your house pick up a bunch of boxing gloves, and Elvarg dies when you finally get your last set of gloves, you are now teleport to the ending faze of where Elvarg finally passes down, and you are teleported outside his cage. So you actually tricked the system saying you were still in there when you killed him but you actually were not in there anymore…

But that one was patched late 07 I believe.

And you can’t wear the BA rings outside of BA anymore

Read full topic
